reviewText: Juli used to be active in many different projects, all of them entertaining.  In recent years, she has been mainly active in the business part of the industry, and not in front of the cameras as much.  In this DVD, she provides the same entertainment that has kept her many fans actively on her side.  She has kept her support with her on this project, especially Gary the Helmetcam guy.  As lengthy as this project is, it is still much too short.
Juli Ashton is great, everything in this movie is very good, but it runs so fast, you have to put in slow motion to watch, and enjoy it.

Playboy's Juli Ashton & Friends - Anything Goes! is fifty minutes long and was released on DVD on January 19, 2004. Juli goes on a sex trip with her friends in places like Budapest and Miami. Only when the producer is in the scene is when it becomes boring. Juli is usually seen having sex with two other ladies and there are sex scenes with the other ladies without Juli. The best part about this is the constant nudity. You don't have to wait for it. This video outshines most other Playboy videos. Playboy: Julie Ashton & Friends gets an AAAAA+++++. Below are lists of the ladies that are in the video.
